name: Vania (PracticalGameDev)
description:
Controls

z to whip, space to jump, arrows left / right, or controller... d-pad and A whip, B jump

down arrows to duck(duck does nothing, implemented for nostalgia)

People involved

A big thank you to VGMushroom for the SFX and Music, he really did a great job, the sound track is great, he did thing's quick and well and he's a bloody nice bloke. His discord LesReves#6922 if anyone wants to ask for his help.

Programmers Notes

I'm really happy with this project, it may not be very Metro, but it's very Vania. It may be a short game but I implement a lot that I wanted, it has fairly good controls, a cutscene, a boss stage, all in all yes I'm happy.  I would have liked to work on this more and make the game bigger, but work calls and I have achieved what I wanted to and itching for the next project. 

Sprites Used

https://programancer.itch.io/spooky-nes-style-horror-asset-pack-1

https://adamatomic.itch.io/dracula

some of my own art and some great CC0 sprites from https://opengameart.org/

Made with

https://godotengine.org/ - best engine in the world!
